casebody.data:
Edward PUNDT, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, petitioner,
v.
VERIZON COMMUNICATIONS, INC., et al. No. 16-762. Supreme Court of the United States March 27, 2017. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied. THE CHIEF JUSTICE took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
